meaningMnemonic: If you can find the <radical>door</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> shaped like a <radical>mouth</radical> it will <kanji>enlighten</kanji> you.
readingMnemonic: The door <kanji>enlight</kanji>ened you by opening up and revealing the <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい) in its door-mouth. "Cake is the key to enlightenment, my child. Now eat it from my mouth."
